location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Robert M Intosh, Acting Commissary of Stores, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of communications dated 15 September and 3 October 1812. In response, it confirms the receipt of military stores sent by the Bombay Government on the Duncanfor the use of the British Mission to the Court of Persia.
